summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting photos and measurements taken by the FBI of the Special Housing Unit (SHU) where Jeffrey Epstein was held, specifically the distance from his cell to the guard desk. The email also mentions providing a hard drive for a phone belonging to someone named Thomas.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the inmate whose cell in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) was photographed and measured by the FBI.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to a phone for which a hard drive may need to be provided by the email's sender.

events.title: AUSA Request for SHU Evidence
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a request for FBI photos and measurements of the Special Housing Unit where Jeffrey Epstein was held, specifically the steps from his cell to the guard desk.

keyFacts: The FBI took photos and measured the number of steps from Jeffrey Epstein's cell to the guard desk in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is requesting this evidence in an email dated September 18, 2019.
The email also references providing a hard drive for a phone belonging to someone named Thomas.
